title: Fix email address and apply 42nd draft theme

requirements.text: Replace all occurrences of the current email address in the frontend with 'thejuristshyd@gmail.com'. This includes ContactPage.tsx, Footer.tsx, and any other component or page that displays an email address.
acceptanceCriteria: Every visible email address on the site shows 'thejuristshyd@gmail.com'
No old/placeholder email address remains anywhere in the UI

requirements.text: Revert the visual theme (color palette, typography, spacing, component styling, and any decorative elements) to match the 42nd draft version of the site. Apply this theme consistently across all pages and components including Header, Footer, HomePage, ContactPage, AboutPage, ServicesPage, and all other visible pages.

quotes: I want the theme of 42nd draft

acceptanceCriteria: The color palette, font choices, and overall visual style match the 42nd draft
The theme is applied consistently across all pages and shared components (Header, Footer, etc.)
No elements from later theme versions remain visible
index.css and tailwind.config.js reflect the 42nd draft design tokens

constraints: Do not re-add the phone number that was previously removed
Do not re-add the login button that was previously removed
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Adding any new features or pages
Changing backend logic or data models
Modifying SEO metadata beyond what is needed for the email fix
